text: Svend Langkjær (August 23, 1886 – May 2, 1948) was a Danish track and field athlete who competed in the 1908 and 1912 Summer Olympics. In 1908 he competed in both the standing high jump and the standing long jump, finishing eighth in the high jump with a height of 1.42. In 1912 he competed in the decathlon. He did not finish, after failing to start the high jump, the fourth of the ten events. == See also == * Denmark at the 1908 Summer Olympics * Denmark at the 1912 Summer Olympics ==External links== * Category:1886 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Danish decathletes Category:Danish high jumpers Category:Danish long jumpers Category:Olympic athletes of Denmark Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic decathletes
title: Svend Langkjær
